Functions
glm_add_dvec3
GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER glm_dvec3 glm_add_dvec3(
glm_dvec3 x,
glm_dvec3 y
)

Add x and y.

Parameters
x
glm_dvec3

The left operand.

y
glm_dvec3

The right operand.

Returns

Returns the sum of x and y

glm_min_dvec3
GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER glm_dvec3 glm_min_dvec3(
glm_dvec3 x,
glm_dvec3 y
)

Returns the minimum of x and y.

Parameters
x
glm_dvec3

The left operand.

y
glm_dvec3

The right operand.

Returns

Returns y if x > y; otherwise it returns x.

glm_max_vec3

Returns the maximum of x and y.

Parameters
x

The left operand.

y

The right operand.

Returns

Returns y if x < y; otherwise it returns x.

glm_clamp_dvec3
GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER glm_dvec3 glm_clamp_dvec3(
glm_dvec3 x,
glm_dvec3 minVal,
glm_dvec3 maxVal
)

Clamps x between minVal and maxVal.

Parameters
x
glm_dvec3

The left operand.

y

The right operand.

Returns

Returns min(max(x, minVal), maxVal). Results are undefined if minVal > maxVal.

glm_mix_dvec3
GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER glm_dvec3 glm_mix_dvec3(
glm_dvec3 x,
glm_dvec3 y,
double a
)

Linearly interpolates between two values.

Parameters
x
glm_dvec3

The first value.

y
glm_dvec3

The second value.

a
double

The interpolation value.

Returns

Returns the linear blend of x and y.

glm_length_dvec3
GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER double glm_length_dvec3(
glm_dvec3 x
)
Parameters
x
glm_dvec3

The vector.

Returns

A vector in the same direction as x but with a length of 1.

glm_normalize_vec3
Parameters
x

The vector.

Returns

A vector in the same direction as x but with a length of 1.

glm_reflect_dvec3
glm_dvec3 glm_reflect_dvec3(
glm_dvec3 I,
glm_dvec3 N
)

For the incident vector I and surface orientation N, returns the reflection direction.  N must already be normalized in order to achieve the desired result.

Parameters
I
glm_dvec3

The incident vector.

N
glm_dvec3

The surface orientation.

Returns

The reflected direction.

glm_refract_dvec3
glm_dvec3 glm_refract_dvec3(
glm_dvec3 I,
glm_dvec3 N,
double eta
)

For the incident vector I and surface normal N, and the ratio of indices of refraction eta, return the refraction vector.  The result is computed by the refraction equation.

Parameters
I
glm_dvec3

Incident vector.

N
glm_dvec3

Surface normal.

eta
double

The ratio of indices of refraction.

Returns

The refracted direction.
